title: Works great on Lollipop
comment: Super handy to just connect once to an open wifi hotspot and never connect automatically again.

title: Essential tool
comment: This app solves the annoying issue of your phone automatically connecting to "open" WiFi networks that you've used before (typically bars and cafés). These networks require you to register and/or login to use them, so they're not really "open" - and connecting to them unknowingly will cause your internet connection to drop. This really should be written into Android as a standard option but here we are.

title: does what it says
comment: Great tool to prevent auto-connecting to those pesky open wifis (cafe, stores, municipal) that only work within 10 feet of the hotspot.
